mapper.delete: delete from user_collect where id = #{id} and user_account = #{account}
delete from user_collect where id in (${ids}) and user_account = #{userAccount}
mapper.insert: insert into user_collect (user_account, class_id, port_id, collect_time,port_title) values (#{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{portId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{collectTime,jdbcType=DATE},#{portTitle})
mapper.select: select id, user_account, class_id, port_id, collect_time, port_title from user_collect where user_account=#{userAccount} limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select count(id) from user_collect where user_account=#{userAccount}
